瓟瓟瓟

瓟字的基本解释

瓟
bó
小瓜。
古书上说的一种草。

瓟
páo
古同“匏”。

瓟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bó］
同“瓝1”。
小瓜。
[②]［páo］
［《廣韻》薄交切，平肴，並。］
(1)葫芦之属。干则中空，可为容器。
(2)见“瓟2瓜”。

瓟字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【瓜字部】　瓟； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页746第12
【廣韻】蒲角切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】弼角切，?音雹。與瓝同。【楚辭·九懷】援瓟瓜兮接糧。　又醬名。【宋孝武帝四時詩】瓟醬調秋菜，白醝解冬寒。　又【廣韻】薄交切【集韻】【韻會】蒲交切，?音袍。【廣韻】瓟瓠可爲飮器。【類篇】匏也。从包，取其可包藏物也。

瓟字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
瓟字的起名意思

暂无。

瓟
Basic explanation of words
瓟
bó
Melon.
A kind of grass said in ancient books.
瓟
páo
Gu Tong "匏".
瓟
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bó］
Same as "瓝1".
Melon.
[②]［páo］
["Guangyun" thin cross-cutting, flat dishes, and. ]
(1) The genus of gourd. If dry, it is hollow and can be a container.
(2) See "Two melons".
瓟
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Guard Word Department] 　瓟; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 746-12
[Guang Yun] Pu Jiao cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] But the corner cut, sound hail. Same as 瓝. [Chu Ci·Jiuhuai] Aid to get food.　Also known as the sauce. [Four Seasons Poems of Emperor Xiaowu of Song Dynasty] The seasoning of autumn vegetables with sauce, the white sauce relieves winter cold.　 [Guang Yun] thin cross cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] Po cross cut,? Yin gown. [Guangyun] 瓟瓠 can be a squash implement. 【Classes】Lady also. From the bag, whichever can be contained is also.
瓟
